html:
Clifford Chance advises 3i Infrastructure on its investment in SRL Traffic Systems - the market-leading traffic management equipment rental company in the UK

Clifford Chance advised long standing client 3i Infrastructure on its acquisition of SRL Traffic Systems, the market-leading traffic management equipment rental company in the UK.

The Clifford Chance team was led by Partner Charlotte Madden with support from Private Equity Director Martin Kolmar, Associates Lianne Mizrachi, Caitlin Hagart and Trainee Raphael Khoo.
